At Hudl [Corley Bagley](https://www.linkedin.com/in/corley-bagley-55928681/) and I
analyzed Hudl's huge database of high school American Football games.
We used sports statistics to find games and moments that would be
exciting to watch in a highlight reel.

Using this dataset, Hudl's media team created the [Greatest Comebacks](https://www.hudl.com/video/5ef26c24ab93fb1a10868c39)
series.
